jobDescription: AI Platform team is leading the charter for the “Intelligent edge and Intelligent cloud” initiative as part of the Cloud + AI platform team. The team is on a mission to build the Industry’s best platform for machine learning and deep learning use cases across both first party and third party workload.  We have ambitious goals for setting the pace for the Industry in this space and need highly experienced, and seasoned data scientist to be part of this mission. We are a growing team building a v1 product in a extremely hot space and with a huge upside, potential and target market.Responsibilities
